articles.title: Study finds how prevalence of metabolic linked to fatty liver disease is increasing - ETHealthWorld
articles.description: The study discovered that Mexican Americans continually had the largest percentage of MAFLD, particularly in 2018, despite the fact that the incidence of rise was higher among Whites.
